source.7b59a3df:
# What programming languages do you use on a regular basis? by users'countries
# Frequency table by users' countries
df_Q7_Q3 = df.groupby('Q3')[['Q7_Part_1', 'Q7_Part_2', 'Q7_Part_3', 'Q7_Part_4', 'Q7_Part_5', 'Q7_Part_6', 'Q7_Part_7', 'Q7_Part_8', 'Q7_Part_9', 'Q7_Part_10', 'Q7_Part_11', 'Q7_Part_12', 'Q7_OTHER']].count()
df_Q7_Q3 = df_Q7_Q3.reset_index()
df_Q7_Q3.rename(columns={'Q3':'Country','Q7_Part_1':'Python', 
                        'Q7_Part_2':'R', 'Q7_Part_3':'SQL' ,
                        'Q7_Part_4':'C','Q7_Part_5':'C++' ,
                        'Q7_Part_6':'Java','Q7_Part_7':'Javascript',
                        'Q7_Part_8':'Julia', 'Q7_Part_9':'Swift',                   
                        'Q7_Part_10':'Bash', 'Q7_Part_11':'MATLAB',
                        'Q7_Part_12':'None',  'Q7_OTHER':'Other'}, inplace=True)                  
# Percentage calculation: the perent of each programming language used by users cuntries
# BY users'countries
# the percentage from total cases-By users'countries
total_users_by_country = df.Q3.value_counts()
total_users_by_country=pd.DataFrame(total_users_by_country)
total_users_by_country.reset_index(inplace=True)
total_users_by_country.rename(columns={'index':'Country','Q3':'# of users'}, inplace=True)
inner_join_Q7_Q3 = pd.merge(df_Q7_Q3,  
                      total_users_by_country,  
                      on ='Country',  
                      how ='inner')
inner_join_Q7_Q3.set_index('Country', inplace=True)
for col in inner_join_Q7_Q3:
    inner_join_Q7_Q3[col] =  (100*inner_join_Q7_Q3[col]/inner_join_Q7_Q3['# of users']).round(2).astype(str) + '%' 
del inner_join_Q7_Q3['# of users']
inner_join_Q7_Q3.reset_index(inplace=True)
# Percentage calculation: the perent of each programming language used by the countries of users 
# BY respondents' countries
# the percentage from total cases-By users'countries
total_users_by_country = df.Q3.value_counts()
total_users_by_country = pd.DataFrame(total_users_by_country)
total_users_by_country.reset_index(inplace=True)
total_users_by_country.rename(columns={'index':'Country','Q3':'# of users'}, inplace=True)
inner_join_Q7_Q3 = pd.merge(df_Q7_Q3,  
                      total_users_by_country,  
                      on ='Country',  
                      how ='inner')
inner_join_Q7_Q3.set_index('Country', inplace=True)
for col in inner_join_Q7_Q3:
    inner_join_Q7_Q3[col] =  (100*inner_join_Q7_Q3[col]/inner_join_Q7_Q3['# of users']).round(2).astype(str) + '%' 
del inner_join_Q7_Q3['# of users']
inner_join_Q7_Q3.reset_index(inplace=True)
inner_join_Q7_Q3.to_excel('latlong1.xlsx')
# after that we will add latitude longitude for countries
inner_join_Q7_Q3.to_csv('latlong1.csv')

import plotly
fig = px.scatter_mapbox(Q3_df, 
                        lat="lat", 
                        lon="long", 
                        hover_name="Country", 
                        hover_data=['Number_of_Respondents','Precentage', 'The percentage of using Python', 'The percentage of using R', 'The percentage of using SQL','The percentage of using C', 'The percentage of using C++', 'The percentage of using Java', 'The percentage of using Javascript', 'The percentage of using Julia', 'The percentage of using Swift', 'The percentage of using Bash', 'The percentage of using MATLAB'], 
                        color='Number_of_Respondents',
                        size='Number_of_Respondents',
                        size_max=30,
                        zoom=0.4,height=800
                       )

fig.update_layout(title='The countries of participants & the percentage of each programming language used by them',
                  font=dict(size=9) 
                 )
fig.update_layout(mapbox_style="open-street-map", mapbox_center_lon=0)
fig.update_layout(margin={"r":10,"t":20,"l":0,"b":0})

plotly.offline.plot(fig, filename='./map_chart.html')

fig.show()
